api_list.name: Check Username Availability
api_list.description: Tells you if a username is available or not.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://discord-username-availability-checker2.p.rapidapi.com/check_username/caiden.xyz"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "discord-username-availability-checker2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://discord-username-availability-checker2.p.rapidapi.com/check_username/{username}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "discord-username-availability-checker2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
